column4: Trying to install Ubuntu 12.10 Asus p4s8x and ubiquity crashes, here's the syslog http://pastebin.com/uuNnfxtC any clues?
there's a non-gui alternate installer that usually works around install issues
damn gotta download/burn alt installer now
sorry to say but his suggestion is valid. maybe not preferred in a ubuntu channel, but still valid. some auto-installers just dont work with certain hardware while others work fine
